headline: Arthur J Gallagher Nears $12 Billion Deal to Buy AssuredPartners
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Arthur J. Gallagher & Co. is in advanced talks to acquire AssuredPartners in a deal valuing the insurance broker at about $12 billion, a person with knowledge of the matter said.Most Read from BloombergA Chicago Skyscraper Cements the Legacy of a Visionary Postmodern ArchitectNYC’s Run-Down Bus Terminal Gets Approval for $10 Billion RevampKansas City Looks Back on its Long, Costly Ride With MicrotransitAn agreement could be announced as soon as Monday, according to the person, who
